I stand in support of Planned Parenthood.  Equal access to health care should be a fundamental right and I won’t stop fighting until we defeat this cruel gag rule and ensure all women have access to quality and affordable health care. https://energycommerce.house.gov/newsroom/press-releases/pallone-on-planned-parenthood-s-withdraw-from-title-x …
Make no mistake, this callous rule concocted by President Trump’s ideological henchmen jeopardizes access to health care for millions across the country, but we aren’t giving up.

The Trump Administration has chosen to intentionally dismantle Title X’s network of quality family planning providers, at the expense of millions of women, men, and adolescents who have relied on Planned Parenthood as their provider of preventive health services.

The rule bans providers in the program from sharing critical health information with patients and places unnecessary & burdensome requirements on grantees without justification. This is yet another step in the Trump Admin's relentless campaign to undermine Americans’ health care.

I’m deeply saddened that @PPFA has been left with no other choice than to withdraw from the Title X family planning program due to President Trump’s domestic gag rule. #StandWithPP #ProtectX https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1163519791732330497 …
